      • getMainMove

        public PlayerMessage getMainMove()
        Description copied from class: SwingPhase
        Checks if the move chose by the player is acceptable and generates either a playerMessageDie, a playerMessageToolCard, player playerMessageEndTurn. If the move is not correct, it generates a playerMessage with clientId as -1
        Specified by:
        getMainMove in class SwingPhase
        Returns:
        playerMessage if the move was correct otherwise a playerMessage with clientId as -1
